name: Liminal Gladiator (juss2186, miandilan, Engi, wibblus, Kuwaiito)
name_original: Liminal Gladiator (juss2186, miandilan, Engi, wibblus, Kuwaiito)
description:
Liminal Gladiator is a 3D Hack n Slash, Adventure game set in a fictional time period, based off of the times of the Roman Empire and the Spartan Legions.
You take control of a being known as the Liminal Gladiator, a fallen Spartan Soldier who has seen his fellow brethren slaughtered before him.
You will take their wills into your hands and deliver the terrible finality of the Roman Empire.

With your shattered sword, made whole;

Your abilities, a boon from the wills of thousands;

You will see your foes rent asunder, for this has been woven in the threads of fate itself.
